title: Boris Becker Faces Possible Prison Time for Concealing Assets After Bankruptcy
sub_head: The six-time Grand Slam tennis champion could face seven years in jail
body:
LONDON—Former top-ranked tennis player Boris Becker is facing a possible jail sentence after being found guilty of concealing hundreds of thousands of dollars in assets after he was declared bankrupt.
The six-time Grand Slam winner appeared for sentencing at London’s Southwark Crown Court on Friday and could face a maximum jail term of seven years.
